title: Lecture Notes
content:
Prof. Dirk Jenter taught Section A and Prof. Katharina Lewellen taught Section B.
Part I: Financing LEC # TOPICS SECTION A SECTION B 1 Lecture: Introduction (PDF) (PDF) 4 Lecture: Capital Structure 1 (PDF) (PDF) 5 Lecture: Capital Structure 2 (PDF) (PDF) 8 Lecture: Capital Structure: Informational and Dynamic Considerations (PDF) (PDF) 10 Review of Financing and Capital Structure (PDF) (PDF) 11 Case: Intel Corporation, 1992 (PDF) Part II: Valuation LEC # TOPICS SECTION A SECTION B 12 Lecture: Valuation of Free Cash Flows (PDF) (PDF) 14 Lecture: WACC and APV (PDF) (PDF) 19 Lecture: Real Options (PDF) (PDF) 21 Lecture: Valuing a Company (PDF) (PDF) 24 Wrap-Up of Valuation (PDF) (PDF)
